Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14661 affecting package glusterfs for versions less than 5.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-14661 affecting package glusterfs for versions less than 5.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glusterfs is earlier than 5.1-1, affected by CVE-2018-14661
